title: John Wiley  Sons  Q1 Earnings What to Expect
content:
Nasdaq  Tuesday 8th September, 2015  
 JW.A 
is scheduled to report first-quarter fiscal 2016 financial numbers 
 
before the opening bell on Sep 9, 2015. The big question facing 
 
investors is whether this publishing company can continue with its 
 
positive earnings surprise streak. 
 
...
